name: Drift or Die! (download)
description:
(This was made for the 2023 7DRL Game Jam. Downloads didn't work on the web version page because of a glitch with SharedArrayBuffer support, so this has to be a separate page.)

Drift or Die!

Find water in each stage before running of fuel. Zombies cannot damage you but will slow you down.

Controls
  • WASD or the arrow keys to move
  • 1/2 or 9/0 to use items
  • M to mute all game sounds
Credits:
  • Godot Sound Manager
  • E1234 font
  • Hit sound effects
  • Bell sound effect
  • Hyper Ultra-Racing (song) by Alex Smith
  • The Wreck (song) by Zander Noriega
  • Everything else by me
